meanings.definition: A cassingle is a single song released on a cassette tape.
meanings.sent1: I found a classic cassingle in my old box of tapes.
meanings.sent2: Back in the day, people used to buy cassingles to listen to their favorite songs.
meanings.sent3: The cassingle decided to take a break from the cassette player and explore the world.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was a cassingle, playing the melody of memories in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The cassingle, with its catchy tune, became the soundtrack of their summer.

meanings.definition: To cassingle is to release a single song on a cassette tape.
meanings.sent1: The band decided to cassingle their latest hit for the fans.
meanings.sent2: She would cassingle her own songs and distribute them at local events.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to cassingle its meows into a musical masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: His words cassingled through the air, reaching every corner of the room.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the waves cassingled with the chirping of birds on the tape.
